name: Zombie vs Shooter Pro
description:
Be ready guys !! Those stupid zombies are back, lets hunt them. Zombies Vs Hunter is a modern game which provides a simulator to hunt half dead bodies. Zombie force are ready to take your place in a crowd of rampaging undead. They attacking the unfortunate survivors and adding them to your unstoppable throng of hungry, hot footed horrors.
To protect your city from stupid zombies, you will have bullets, grenades, time-bombs and machine run but these are limited.
When the duty calls, you will have to be ready for all kind of challenges - like arms with snippers, grenades, bullets etc.
The Rules are simple -
- Remember that don't let them bite you.
- Shoot the head of them
- Shoot faster
- Do not kill humans
- Some Zombies with golden cap will not killed by Zombooka so use chainsaw (Yellow bullet) to kill those zombies
- Destroy the zombies before they kill you
- Take on the Zombie Invasion with a BAZOOKA.
- Do not waste the bullets

How to play:
- Tap on screen to firing.
- Drag left bar to adjust release power.
- Click the left/right arrow to switch the gun.
- Always target Zombie neck to destroy them completely.
- Each level have a unique way to clear
